filterType.description: Specify Choice of filter used for SW Stats. Data range: AFS_ON_IIR (1), AFS_ON_FIR (2). Constraints: DO NOT USE AFS_OFF. Effect: Specifies to use FIR or IIR fitler.

filterCoeffA.description: High pass FIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 1x11 kernel. Only 11 parameters are configurable.
High pass FIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 1x11 kernel. Only 11 parameters are configurable.
High pass FIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 1x11 kernel. Only 11 parameters are configurable.
High pass FIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 1x11 kernel. Only 11 parameters are configurable.

High pass FIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 1x11 kernel. Only 11 parameters are configurable.
High pass FIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 1x11 kernel. Only 11 parameters are configurable.

FVMinHigh.description: Minimum FV value to be accumulated with respect to the filter. Effect: Higher value will result in a sharper FV curve but it might filter out low contrast context or missing peak. Lower Value will have flatter curve due to noise.

FVMinLow.description: Minimum FV value to be accumulated with respect to the filter. Effect: Higher value will result in a sharper FV curve but it might filter out low contrast context or missing peak. Lower Value will have flatter curve due to noise.

coefficientlength.description: Length of the filter coefficients used. Constraints: Should not modify randomly; should match the filter entries used. Effect: For different camera use case, different kernel is used.

filterCoeffA.description: High pass IIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 2x6 kernel, all 6 parameters are configurable.
High pass IIR filter coeffs used for focus value calculation. For 2x6 kernel, all 6 parameters are configurable.

SWFVMinimumLuxTriggerHigh.description: Lux trigger to use normal FV_min. Effect: Lower value will activate normal light fv_min at a brighter condition.

SWFVMinimumLuxTriggerLow.description: Lux trigger to use lowlight FV_min. Effect: Lower value will activate normal light fv_min at a brighter condition.
